text: An independent record label is a company which musicians can use to make and sell records. These companies are different from major record labels because they are smaller and don't operate under any major businesses. ==Examples== Some examples of independent record labels are: * Ambush Reality, which is owned and run by the members of the band Enter Shikari and their friends. * Super Records, which is owned by the band McFly ==References== *
title: Independent record label
